授業目的: The purpose of the course is for students to learn about the Great Depression, including causes, effects, and what life was like during that time. While learning about the Great Depression, students will improve their English language skills.
到達目標: By the end of the course, students will have gained a sense of what life was like during the Great Depression and why what happened during that time  is still relevant, today. They will increase their reading comprehesion, listening  comprehesion, note taking skills, wrting of summaries, and vocabulary.
授業方法:
Classes will be conducted in English. Students will do reading, engage in reading theater and role plays, fill out worksheets, take notes during lectures, watch videos, and participate in group discussions.
Classes may be taught face-to-face from Tuesday, October 12, 2021.

トピック.授業計画1: The course incorporates history, literature, video, and songs  into the curriculum.  In class, students will participate in group discussions, work with texts, complete worksheets; watch videos, listen to lectures, and take notes, as well as do in-class activities.
トピック.授業外学習2: Students will be required to do reading, complete worksheets,  learn vocabulary, and do writing assignments.
